DOC.brief_summary: To determine optimal route administration , dose level , safety intravenous subcutaneous dose sotatercept maintain hemoglobin level subject hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Intravenous Subcutaneous Dosing Sotatercept ( ACE-011 ) Patients With End-Stage Kidney Disease Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females ≥ 18 year age . 2 . Subjects least 6 hour hemodialysis per week , least 12 week screen 3 . Subjects must stable intravenous subcutaneous dose Erythropoietin Stimulating Agents ( exclude methoxy polyethylene glycolepoetin beta [ Mircera ] ) maintain hemoglobin . 4 . A mean predialysis hemoglobin concentration ≥ 10 g/dL ( grams per deciliter ) ≤ 12 g/dL ( ≥ 100 g/L ( grams per liter ) ≤ 120 g/L ) obtain three consecutive day . 4 . A Body Mass Index value ≥ 18.5 kg/m2 ( kilogram per m2 ) screening . 5 . Understand voluntarily sign informed consent document prior study related assessments/procedures conduct . 6 . Able adhere study visit schedule comply protocol requirement . 1 . Non renal cause anemia 2 . Subjects peritoneal dialysis . 3 . Systemic hematological disease 4 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c ( hemoglobin A1c ) > 9 % ) screening . 5 . Uncontrolled hypertension define mean home systolic blood pressure > 160 mm Hg ( millimeter mercury ) mean home diastolic blood pressure > 90 mm Hg calculate screening period prior randomization 6 . Subjects heart failure 7 . History malignancy ( except excise cured nonmelanoma skin cancer , cervical carcinoma situ surgically ablate 5 year ago ) . 8 . Anticipated schedule live donor renal transplant course study .
